// Review.js
import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./review.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Review(){const[score,setScore]=useState('');const[reviewBody,setReviewBody]=useState('');async function submitReview(e){e.preventDefault();try{await axios.post('http://localhost:3000/review',{score,reviewBody});}catch(error){console.error(error);}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"review-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{onSubmit:submitReview,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inputs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"input-text",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",className:"review-score",value:score,onChange:e=>setScore(e.target.value),placeholder:"0-100",min:"0",max:"100"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"input-text",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"review-body",value:reviewBody,onChange:e=>setReviewBody(e.target.value),placeholder:"Write your review (optional)",maxLength:2000,rows:5})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"submit-button",children:"Submit Review"})]})})});}export default Review;
